name: enumerator_num
label::English: 1. Please record your enumerator number
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: sample_id
label::English: 2.1 Please record the sample ID of the household
2.2 Please enter the enumeration area of the household
2.3 Please enter the locality code of the household
2.4 Please enter the Oslo Area of the household

name: dc_method
label::English: 3. Is this interview conducted face to face or remotely over the phone?

name: location
label::English: 4. Is this interview taking place in the West Bank, Gaza Strip, or East Jerusalem?

name: camp
label::English: 4.1 Is this interview taking place in a refugee camp?

name: consent
label::English:
5. Hi my name is _____ and I work for the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics. We are currently conducting a survey on household needs and would like to ask you some questions about your household composition, income generating activities, health and WASH access, access to food, protection services, and humanitarian aid. 
The survey will take 30 minutes to complete. 
The information you provide will be used to inform the humanitarian response plan in the country. Any information you provide will be kept strictly confidential and anonymous. Your name will not appear anywhere and only collective analysis will be done.  
You will not receive any benefits or services for completing the survey but we hope that you do participate as your views are very important to better inform the humanitarian response. 
The survey is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any question and/or quit at any point. 
Do you have any questions? Do you agree to participate in this survey?
constraint_message::English: End survey if the respondent does not say yes

name: no_consent
label::English: END OF SURVEY - THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME please exit the form and do not submit

name: hh_characteristics
label::English: Household characteristics

name: hhh_r
label::English: 6. Are you the head of household?
hint::English: A household is a group of people who regularly share meals, income, and expenditures together. Members must acknowledge the authority of one person as head of household and that person must actually live with the rest of the household members. In polygamous households, each wife is treated as a distinct household when the wives live in different houses, cook separately and take decisions independently.

name: will_to_response_r
label::English: 6.1 If no, are you willing and able to respond to the questions on behalf of the household?
constraint_message::English: End survey if the person is not willing respond on behalf or his/her household

name: relationship
label::English: 6.2 What is your relation to the head of household?

name: age_respondent_r
label::English: 7. What is your age?
constraint_message::English: Age cannot be below 18 and above 120

name: gender_respondent_r
label::English: 8. Respondent's sex

name: sex_head_hh
label::English: 9. What is the sex of the head of household?

name: hh_location_wb
label::English: 10. In what governorate is your household's primary residence?

name: hh_location_gaza
label::English: 11. In what municipality is your household's primary residence?

name: refugee_status
label::English: 12.Is your household a refugee household?

name: household_size
label::English: Household Size by group

name: household_size
label::English: 1.12 How many people are there in your household (including yourself), by age and sex?
hint::English: Enter 999 in case the respondent does not know

name: calc_note
preg_lactating
label::English: 13. Is any member of your household pregnant or lactating?

name: chronic_illness
label::English: 14. Does any member of your household have a chronic illness (e.g. heart disease, hypertension, blood disease, cancer, lung disease, diabetes, renal diseases)?

name: displacement
label::English: Displacement

name: permanent_location
label::English: 15.Was your household living in this location prior to the outbreak of the most recent conflict on the 11th of May 2021?

name: displacement_status
label::English: 16.Has your household been displaced from this location since 11th of May 2021?

name: currently_hosting_displaced
label::English: 17.Are you currently hosting any displaced individuals

name: food_security
label::English: Food Security Survey

name: food_consumption
label::English: Food Consumption

name: food_security_note
label::English: 18. Over the last 7 days, how many days did your household consume the following food?

name: cereals
label::English: 18.1 Cereals, grains, roots and tubers: rice, pasta, bread, potato,
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: nuts_seed
label::English: 18.2 Legumes / nuts : beans, peanuts, lentils, nut, soy, and / or other nuts
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: milk_dairy
label::English: 18.3 Milk and other dairy products: fresh milk / sour, yogurt, cheese, other dairy products (Exclude margarine / butter or small amounts of milk for tea / coffee)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: meat
label::English: 18.4 Meat, fish and eggs: goat, beef, chicken, fish, including canned tuna, and / or other seafood, eggs (meat and fish consumed in large quantities and not as a condiment)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: vegetables
label::English: 18.5 Vegetables and leaves: spinach, onion, tomatoes, carrots, peppers, green beans, lettuce, cabbages, egg plants, etc
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: fruits
label::English: 18.6 Fruits: banana, apple, lemon, mango, watermelon, apricot, peach, pineapple, passion, gishta, orange, avocado, wild fruits etc
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: oil_fats
label::English: 18.7 Oil / fat / butter: vegetable oil, palm oil, margarine, other fats / oil
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: sweets
label::English: 18.8 Sugar, or sweet: sugar, honey, jam, cakes, candy, cookies, pastries, cakes and other sweet (sugary drinks)
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: spices_condiments
label::English: 18.9 Condiments / Spices: tea, coffee / cocoa, salt, garlic, spices, yeast / baking powder, lanwin, tomato / sauce, meat or fish as a condiment, condiments including small amount of milk / tea coffee.
constraint_message::English: Must be between 0 and 7 days

name: food_insecurity
label::English: Food Insecurity

name: fies_note
label::English: Now I would like to ask you some questions about your food consumption in the last 12 months. During the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when:

name: lack_enough_food
label::English: 19.1 During the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household were worried they would not have enough food to eat because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_health_food
label::English: 19.2 Still thinking about the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household were unable to eat healthy and nutritious food because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_food_variety
label::English: 19.3 Was there a time when you or others in your household ate only a few kinds of foods because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: skipped_meals
label::English: 19.4 Was there a time when you or others in your household had to skip a meal because there was not enough money or other resources to get food?

name: ate_less
label::English: 19.5 Still thinking about the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household ate less than they thought they should because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: out_of_food
label::English: 19.6 Was there a time when your household ran out of food because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: hungry_ddnt_eat
label::English: 19.7 Was there a time when you or others in your household were hungry but did not eat because there was not enough money or other resources for food?

name: day_without_eating
label::English: 19.8 Was there a time when you or others in your household went without eating for a whole day because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_of_food_mitigation
label::English: Lack of food mitigation strategies

name: mitigation_note
label::English: 20. During the past 30 days, did anyone in your household have to do one of the following things because there was not enough food or money to buy it?

name: selling_hh_properties
label::English: 20.1 Selling household properties (refrigerator, television, jewelry…)

name: buying_food_on_credit
label::English: 20.2 Buying food on credit or through borrowed money from relatives, friends or financial institutions

name: selling_means_of_tranport
label::English: 20.3 Selling means of transport (car, motorbike)

name: children_dropout
label::English: 20.4 Children dropout from school

name: reducing_expenditure
label::English: 20.5 Reducing expenditure on non-food items (health, education)

name: changing_residency
label::English: 20.6 Sent household members to eat elsewhere

name: risky_behaviour
label::English: 20.7 Accepting that adults engage in risky behavior

name: child_labour
label::English: 20.8 Children under 18 work to provide resources

name: migration_of_hh
label::English: 20.9 Whole family are migrating

name: forced_marriages
label::English: 20.10 Children or adult forcefully marriaged

name: selling_animals
label::English: 20.11 Sold more animals (non-productive) than usual

name: move_school
label::English: 20.12 Move children to less expensive school

name: lack_of_food
label::English: Lack of Food

name: no_food
label::English: 21. In the past 30 days, was there ever no food to eat of any kind in your house because of lack of resources to get food?

name: no_food_freq
label::English: 21.1How often did this happen in the past 30 days?

name: health_group
label::English: Health Survey

name: health_start
label::English: The next couple of questions will pertain to the HEALTH situation of your household members as well as their access to healthcare services

name: distance_hospital
label::English: 22. How long (in minutes) does it take anyone from your household to get to the nearest, functional health facility by your normal mode of transportation?

name: health_accessed
label::English: 23.  During the last 3 months, did anyone from your household have a health problem and needed to access health care?

name: treatment_required
label::English: 23.1 What type of treatment/check-up did the person require?
constraint: not(selected(.,‘don_t_know’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘prefer_not_to_answer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: treatment_required_other
label::English: 23.2 If other, please specify

name: difficulty_accessing_treatment
label::English: 23.3 Did this household member experience any difficulties when trying to access health services?

name: health_barriers
label::English: 24.1  What barriers if any did your household experience to prevent you from accessing the health care you needed? [choose up to 3 most important]
constraint: count-selected(.)<=3. and not(selected(.,‘don_t_know’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘prefer_not_to_answer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Can only select 3 options and Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: health_barriers_other
label::English: 24.2 If other, please specify

name: obstructive_barriers
label::English: 24.3 Which of these barriers have become more obstructive as a result of the recent escalation?
constraint: count-selected(.)<=3. and not(selected(.,‘don_t_know’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘prefer_not_to_answer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Can only select 3 options and Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: obstructive_barriers_other
label::English: 24.4 If other, please specify

name: vaccine
label::English: 25. Are all members of your household willing to be vaccinated against COVID-19?

name: vaccine_no_num
label::English: 25.1 How many household members are not willing to be vaccinated?

name: vaccine_why_not
label::English: 25.2 If no, why do members of your household not intend to be vaccinated?
constraint: not(selected(.,‘don_t_know’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘decline_to_answer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "decline_to_answer" with any other option

name: vaccine_why_not_other
label::English: 25.3 If other type, please specify

name: disabilities
label::English: Disabilities

name: presence_disability
label::English: 26. Is there anyone in your household having lots of difficulty doing any of the following activities or who cannot do any of the following activities at all? (please select all that apply)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other options

name: num_disability
label::English: 27. How many members of your household have a lot of difficulties or cannot do any of these activities?

name: disabilities_loop
label::English: Disabilities loop

name: member
label::English: Add a new group for each family member with a lot of difficulties doing an activity or who cannot do any activity at all

name: difficulty_sex
label::English: 28. What is the sex of [this person]?

name: difficulty_age
label::English: 29. What is the age of [this person]?

name: difficulty_seeing
label::English: 30.1 Does [this person] have difficulty seeing, even if wearing glasses?

name: difficulty_hearing
label::English: 30.2 Does [this person] have difficulty hearing, even if using a hearing aid?

name: difficulty_walking
label::English: 30.3 Does [this person] have difficulty walking or climbing steps?

name: difficulty_remembering
label::English: 30.4 Does [this person] have difficulty remembering or concentrating?

name: difficulty_washing
label::English: 30.5 Does [this person] have difficulty with (self-care, such as) washing all over or dressing?

name: difficulty_communicating
label::English: 30.6 Using your usual (customary) language, does [this person] have difficulty communicating, for example understanding or being understood?

name: cwd_calc
calculation: if(${difficulty_seeing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_seeing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_hearing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_hearing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_walking}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_walking}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_remembering}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_remembering}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_washing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_washing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_communicating}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_communicating}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_age} < 18,1,0)

name: female_disability_calc
calculation: if(${difficulty_seeing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_seeing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_hearing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_hearing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_walking}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_walking}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_remembering}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_remembering}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_washing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_washing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_communicating}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_communicating}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_sex}="female",1,0)

name: male_disability_calc
calculation: if(${difficulty_seeing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_seeing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_hearing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_hearing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_walking}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_walking}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_remembering}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_remembering}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_washing}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_washing}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_communicating}='a_lot_of_difficulty' or ${difficulty_communicating}='cannot_do_at_all' and ${difficulty_sex}="male",1,0)

name: calc_tot_cwd_note
difficulty_accessing_services
label::English: 31. Does any member of your household face any difficulties in accessing any basic services (e.g education, health clinics, markets, etc.) due to their physical or mental difficulty?

name: why_difficulty_services
label::English: 31.1 If yes, what is the main reason preventing them from accessing services?

name: why_difficulty_services_other
label::English: 31.2 If other, please describe

name: hh_member_distress
label::English: 32. Has any member of your household suffered or showed signs of psychosocial distress or trauma such as nightmare, lasting sadness, extreme fatigue, being often tearful or extreme anxiety, in the last 30 days?

name: child_distress_number
label::English: 32.1 If yes, how many persons under 18 years showed these signs?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than number of children (less than 18 years old) in household

name: adult_distress_number
label::English: 32.2 If yes, how many persons aged 18 or older showed these signs?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than number of adults (18 years and older) in household

name: psychosocial_services
label::English: 33. Are you aware of any medical, legal, mental health and/or psychosocial support services for women and girls available in your community in case they experience harm or violence (incl. sexual abuse and exploitation) because of their gender?

name: type_of_pss
label::English: 33.1 If yes, what types of services are you aware of?
constraint: not(selected(.,"prefer_not_to_answer") and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(.,"dont_know") and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: type_of_pss_other
label::English: 33.2 If other, please describe

name: women_specialised_services
label::English: 34. Do women of reproductive age (15-49 years) have access to specialized reproductive health services?

name: wash
label::English: WASH Survey

name: wash_start
label::English: The next couple of questions will pertain to the WATER, SANITATION and HYGIENE situation of your household

name: drinking_water_source
label::English: 35. What is the main source of water used by your household for drinking purposes?

name: drinking_source_other
label::English: 35.1 If other, please specify

name: changed_drinking_source
label::English: 35.2 Is this water source different from the primary one used by your household before the recent escalation?

name: domestic_water_source
label::English: 36. What is the main source of water used by your household for domestic purposes (cooking, personal hygiene, cleaning)?

name: domestic_source_other
label::English: 36.1 If other, please specify

name: latrines
label::English: 37. What kind of sanitation facility (latrine/toilet) does your household usually use?

name: latrines_other
label::English: 37.1  If other, please specify

name: shared_sanitation
label::English: 37.2 Do you share this sanitation facility (latrine or toilet) with other households?

name: num_hh_sharing_sanitation
label::English: 37.3 If yes, how many households are you sharing this sanitation facility with?
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: latrine_items
label::English: 38. Which of the following items are permanently available in your latrine? [NOTE: Read all items from the list]
constraint_message::English: Can not select "None" with other items

name: latrines_lockable_inside
label::English: 39. Are the latrines used by your household lockable from the inside?

name: latrine_waste_drainage
label::English: 40. Where does waste water from the toilet/latrine that you use drain into?

name: waste_drainage_other
label::English: 40.1 If other, please specify

name: water_sufficiency
label::English: Water Sufficiency

name: sufficient_water
label::English: 41. Does your household currently have enough water to meet the following needs?

name: sufficient_water_drinking
label::English: 41.1 Drinking

name: sufficient_water_cooking
label::English: 41.2 Cooking

name: sufficient_water_hygiene_personal
label::English: 41.3 Personal hygiene (washing or bathing)

name: sufficient_water_hygiene_domestic
label::English: 41.4 Domestic hygiene (cleaning house, floor, etc.)

name: sufficient_water_other
label::English: 41.5 Other domestic purposes

name: water_coping_mechanism
label::English: 42. How has your household coped with any lack of water?
relevant: selected(${sufficient_water_drinking}, 'no') and selected(${sufficient_water_cooking}, 'no') and selected(${sufficient_water_hygiene_personal}, 'no') and selected(${sufficient_water_hygiene_domestic}, 'no') and selected(${location}, 'gaza')
constraint: not(selected(.,"prefer_not_to_answer") and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(.,"dont_know") and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: water_coping_other
label::English: 42.1 If other, please specify

name: num_of_floods
label::English: 43. How many times has your current location seen flooding in the past 3 years?
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: floods
label::English: Floods

name: floods_effects
label::English: 43.1 How have your daily activities been affected by floods in the past three years?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "No Effects" and any other option

name: floods_effects_other
label::English: 43.2 If other, please specify

name: floods_shelter_effects
label::English: 43.3 How has your shelter been affected by floods in the past three years?
constraint: not(selected(.,‘none’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘prefer_not_to_answer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: shelter_effects_other
label::English: 43.4 If other, please specify

name: floods_mitigation_measures
label::English: 43.5 What mitigation measures have you used to reduce the risk of floodings?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "No mitigation measures" with any other option

name: floods_mitigation_other
label::English: 43.6 If other, please specify

name: solid_waste_disposal
label::English: 44. How is solid waste from your household disposed of?

name: solid_disposal_other
label::English: 44.1 If other, please specify

name: waste_accumulation_days
label::English: 45. How many days in the past 7 days did you see solid waste accumulation in your area?
constraint_message::English: Maximum number of days are 7.

name: shelter
label::English: Shelter

name: shelter_start
label::English: The next couple of questions will pertain to the situation of the SHELTER that your household is living in

name: shelter_type_inperson
label::English: 46. What type of shelter is the household living in?

name: shelter_type_other
label::English: 46.1 If other, please specify

name: shelter_description
label::English: Shelter description

name: rooms_in_shelter
label::English: 47. In total, how many rooms are there in use in this shelter?

name: num_of_bedrooms
label::English: 47.1 Bedrooms / sleeping areas
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: num_of_livingrooms
label::English: 47.2 Living rooms / common areas
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: num_bathroom
label::English: 47.3 Bathroom / toilets
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: calc_num_of_rooms_note
label::English: Total number of rooms: ${num_of_rooms}

name: occupancy_status
label::English: 48.What is the occupancy arrangement in your current dwelling?

name: occupancy_status_other
label::English: 48.1 If other, please specify

name: hh_risk_eviction
label::English: 49. Is your HH presently at risk of eviction?

name: hh_main_risks
label::English: 49.1 What are the main reasons for fearing eviction?

name: hh_main_risks_other
label::English: 49.2 If other, please specify

name: shelter_issues
label::English: 50. Does the shelter currently have any damage or defects?
constraint: not(selected(.,‘none’) and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(., ‘know_prefer’) and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" or "Don't Know/Prefer Not To Say" with any other option

name: shelter_issues_other
label::English: 50.1 If other, please describe

name: experienced_threats
label::English: 51. Has any member of your household experienced threats or violent/destructive acts by non-Palestinian communities living in your area in the past 30 days? (FOR WEST BANK ONLY)

name: type_of_threats
label::English: 51.1 If yes, please indicate the type of threats or violent/destructive acts

name: type_of_threats_other
label::English: 51.2 If other, please specify

name: coping_mechanism_threats
label::English: 51.3 What measures has your household employed to avoid these acts in the past 30 days?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other options

name: coping_mechanism_threats_other
label::English: 51.4 If other, please specify
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other options

name: education
label::English: Education survey

name: education_start
label::English: The next couple of questions will pertain to EDUCATION of children living in the household and their access to education services

name: school_enrollment
label::English: Children School enrollment

name: school_enrollment_note
label::English:
52. For the 2020-2021 school year, how many school-aged children in the household were enrolled (registered) in formal school? NOTE: this does not mean going physically to school (as schools were partially closed), but that the child was registered/affiliated/'signed-up' with a school.
NOTE:  This includes enrolment in either full-time public schools or recognised private schools.

name: num_boys_5_10
label::English: 52.1 How many boys aged 5-10 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of boys (5-10 years old) in the household

name: num_girls_5_10
label::English: 52.2 How many girls aged 5-10 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of girls (5-10 years old) in the household

name: num_boys_11_15
label::English: 52.3 How many boys aged 11-15 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of boys (11-15 years old) in the household

name: num_girls_11_15
label::English: 52.4 How many girls aged 11-15 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of girls (11-15 years old) in the household

name: num_boys_16_17
label::English: 52.5 How many boys aged 16-17 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of boys (16-17 years old) in the household

name: num_girls_16_17
label::English: 52.6 How many girls aged 16-17 were enrolled in school?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of girls (16-17 years old) in the household

name: total_enrolled_children
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of children in the household

name: calc_note
label::English:
Total number of children currently enrolled in school: ${total_enrolled_children}  
Total number of children currently NOT enrolled in school: (${tot_children_school} - ${total_enrolled_children})

name: school_going_children
label::English: School Going Children

name: remote_learning
label::English: 53. While schools were closed in the current school year (2020-2021), how many school-aged children in the household were accessing distance learning regularly? This means they were doing some distance learning activities at least 4 days per week, for at least 3 hours per day e.g. listening to radio/TV broadcasts, textbook learning, online learning
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of school-aged children in the household

name: dropout
label::English: 54. How many school-aged children in your household dropped out of school during the current school year (2020-2021)?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of school-aged children in the household

name: drop_out_reason
label::English: 54.1 If you have any children that dropped out of school, define the main reason(s) for dropping out
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other option

name: other_drop_out
label::English: 54.2 If other, please specify

name: disabled_schl_attendance
label::English: 55. Are any school-aged children with a disability not attending formal or informal education regularly (at least 4 days per week)

name: disabled_edu_challenges
label::English: 55.1 What additional challenges do children with a disability face in accessing education services?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other option

name: other_disabled_edu_challenges
label::English: 55.2 If other, please specify

name: catch_up_learning

name: planning_schl_enrollment

name: non_enrollment_reasons
label::English: 57.1 If you are not planning on enrolling at least one of your children at the start of next year, what are the reasons?
constraint: not(selected(.,"prefer_not_to_answer") and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(.,"dont_know") and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: other_non_enrollment_reasons

constraint_message::English: Cannot select "No"or "Not Sure" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: pss_services_other
label::English: 58.1 If other, please specify

name: edu_barriers
label::English: 59. For those children not attending school, what were the reasons?
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "None" with any other option

name: edu_barriers_other
label::English: 59.1 If other, please specify

name: primary_school_place

name: livelihoods_start

name: tot_income
label::English: 63. Could you estimate your household's total income over the last 30 days (in NIS)?
constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: income_change_covid
label::English: 63.1 Has your household's typical monthly income decreased as a result of the COVID-19 outbreak (March 2020) (e.g. Wage earners getting sick, wage earners having to stay home to care for the sick, restrictions put in place to stem virus spread, etc.)?

name: income_change_conflict
label::English: 63.2 What has been the impact of the recent escalation on your household's income, money, livelihood assets or resources?
constraint: not(selected(.,"prefer_not_to_answer") and count-selected(.) >1) and not(selected(.,"dont_know") and count-selected(.) >1)
constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Don't Know" or "Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: income_change_other
label::English: 63.4 If other, please specify

name: how_much_debt

constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: other_reasons_for_debt
label::English: 64.2 If other, specify please

name: debt_due_to_covid
label::English: 64.3 Has the household's amount of debt increased as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic?

name: tot_expenses

constraint_message::English: Value is likely too high

name: expenses

label::English: 66.1 Food

name: water_exp
label::English: 66.2 Water

name: rent_exp
label::English: 66.3 Rent

name: medical_exp
label::English: 66.4 Medical care (including medicine)

name: debt_repayment
label::English: 66.5 Debt repayment

name: fuel_exp
label::English: 66.6 Fuel and electricity

name: exp_compare
label::English: The expenditure for rent, medical care and food cannot be larger than the total expenditure

constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than total number of adults

name: unemployed_adults
label::English: 68. How many adults 18+ years are currently unemployed and seeking work?
constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than total number of adults

constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of boys between 11 and 17

name: under_18_working_girls

constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than the total number of girls between 11 and 17

name: covid_employment

name: covid_loss_job

hint::English: Job losses should be directly attributable to COVID-19 policies, health issues from COVID-19, etc.

name: covid_job_note
label::English: 71.1  If yes, how many members of your household have lost their job permanently and how many temporarily?  (including yourself if you lost your job)
hint::English: Job losses should be directly attributable to COVID-19 policies, health issues from COVID-19, etc. If none, enter 0.

name: covid_loss_job_permanent

constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than household size

name: covid_loss_job_temp

constraint_message::English: Cannot be larger than household size

name: conflict_job_loss
label::English: 71.4 Have any members of your household lost their jobs, either permanently or temporarily, as a result of the recent escalation?

constraint_message::English: Cannot select "Do not want to receive humanitarian assistance" or "Don't Know" or Prefer Not To Answer" with any other option

name: contact_number

name: m_f_survey
label::English: 87. [DO NOT READ] Has this household been selected for surveys to be conducted with both male and female respondents?

name: m_f_survey_participant
label::English: 87.1. Thank you for your time and answers. As part of this assessment, we are interested in gathering information from both male and female household members on certain key questions. Your household has been randomly selected to participate. With your permission, we would like to conduct another interview with one of your household members of the opposite sex. The interview will take 15 minutes, at most, and we will not ask any new questions, but only the ones that we asked you previously. Is there an adult member of the opposite sex who would be available to participate?

name: gender_sensitivity
label::English: Gender Senstivity

name: second_participant
label::English: Second Participant

name: consent2
label::English:
88. Hi my name is _____ and I work for the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics. We are currently conducting a survey on household needs and would like to ask you some questions about your household composition, income generating activities, health and WASH access, access to food, protection services, and humanitarian aid. 
The survey will take 10 minutes to complete. 
The information you provide will be used to inform the humanitarian response plan in the country. Any information you provide will be kept strictly confidential and anonymous. Your name will not appear anywhere and only collective analysis will be done.  
You will not receive any benefits or services for completing the survey but we hope that you do participate as your views are very important to better inform the humanitarian response. 
The survey is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any question and/or quit at any point. 
Do you have any questions? Do you agree to participate in this survey?

name: hh_characteristics2
label::English: Second Participant Demographics

name: relationship2
label::English: 89. What is your relation to the head of household?

name: age_respondent_r2
label::English: 90. What is your age?
constraint_message::English: Age cannot be below 18 and above 120

name: gender_respondent_r2
label::English: 91. Respondent's sex

name: food_insecurity_2
label::English: Food Insecurity

name: fies_note_2
label::English: Now I would like to ask you some questions about your food consumption in the last 12 months. During the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when:

name: lack_enough_food_2
label::English: 92.1 During the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household were worried they would not have enough food to eat because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_health_food_2
label::English: 92.2 Still thinking about the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household were unable to eat healthy and nutritious food because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_food_variety_2
label::English: 92.3 Was there a time when you or others in your household ate only a few kinds of foods because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: skipped_meals_2
label::English: 92.4 Was there a time when you or others in your household had to skip a meal because there was not enough money or other resources to get food?

name: ate_less_2
label::English: 92.5 Still thinking about the last 12 MONTHS, was there a time when you or others in your household ate less than they thought they should because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: out_of_food_2
label::English: 92.6 Was there a time when your household ran out of food because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: hungry_ddnt_eat_2
label::English: 92.7 Was there a time when you or others in your household were hungry but did not eat because there was not enough money or other resources for food?

name: day_without_eating_2
label::English: 92.8 Was there a time when you or others in your household went without eating for a whole day because of a lack of money or other resources?

name: lack_of_food_mitigation_2
label::English: Lack of food mitigation strategies

name: mitigation_note_2
label::English: 93. During the past 30 days, did anyone in your household have to do one of the following things because there was not enough food or money to buy it?

name: selling_hh_properties_2
label::English: 93.1 Selling household properties (refrigerator, television, jewelry…)

name: buying_food_on_credit_2
label::English: 93.2 Buying food on credit or through borrowed money from relatives, friends or financial institutions

name: selling_means_of_tranport_2
label::English: 93.3 Selling means of transport (car, motorbike)

name: children_dropout_2
label::English: 93.4 Children dropout from school

name: reducing_expenditure_2
label::English: 93.5 Reducing expenditure on non-food items (health, education)

name: changing_residency_2
label::English: 93.6 Sent household members to eat elsewhere

name: risky_behaviour_2
label::English: 93.7 Accepting that adults engage in risky behavior

name: child_labour_2
label::English: 93.8 Children under 18 work to provide resources

name: migration_of_hh_2
label::English: 93.9 Whole family are migrating

name: forced_marriages_2
label::English: 93.10 Children or adult forcefully marriaged

name: selling_animals_2
label::English: 93.11 Sold more animals (non-productive) than usual

name: move_school_2
label::English: 93.12 Move children to less expensive school

name: health_group_2
label::English: Health Survey

name: hh_member_distress_2

name: adult_distress_number_2

name: aap_start_2
label::English: The next couple of questions will pertain to humanitarian and/or development aid that your household might receive/have received

name: aid_received_2
label::English: 104. Have you received aid in the past 30 days?

name: aid_satisfaction_2

name: aid_not_satisfied_2

name: aid_not_satisfied_other_2

name: complaint_mechanisms_2
label::English: 105. Are you aware of how to access complaint mechanisms?

name: feedback_provided_2
label::English: 105.1 Would you use the existing complaint mechanisms to provide feedback on the aid that you have received and/or the way that aid workers have behaved in your location?

name: feedback_channel_quality_2

name: reasons_no_complaint_2
